about_the_game:
Bounty hunters arrive at a small camp outside a temple dedicated to the Goddess, in search of a doctor and her students. Unfortunately, there's more waiting in the temple than the tales of treasure and power would have you believe...can you survive long enough to complete the job?

Overview
=========
-Forensic storytelling and questlines involving others exploring the temple
-Item-based progression (no grinding!)
-Use the power of your enemies to live another day!
-Make character builds on the fly to deal with each new challenge
-Save often, you're going to die

Note
=========
Knowing exactly where to go and what to do,
it took me about 12 hours to do all questlines and
hit true ending.

content_descriptors.notes:
Sensitive Topics
===============
>Suicide
>Slavery
>Loss of loved ones
>In-universe world religion
>Child death

Most of these are NOT heavily involved, though they are all present.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Gen 11, i3, 3.0GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel(R) UHD Graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: A dark fantasy JRPG that focusses on equipment-based progression rather than leveling up. Explore, meet people, and simply survive in order to gain what you need to overcome the trials of the Goddess's temple.
